. For Rimelight employees it's also available in our internal tools, where they help us maintain and improve it.
All employees are mandated to read this document during our onboarding process, and are expected to act according to the norms listed within.
Rimelight Entertainment reserves the right to change any rules herein at will and without notice.
This handbook does not constitute a legally binding contract.

We have various other guidelines and similar documents for more specific areas within the company. They may be found within their respective parts of our internal documentation, but some are also
publicly available at _.

Hello! My name is Daniel Marchi, and I am the creator of Rimelight Entertainment. While the entirety of this handbook has been created through the contribution of multiple people, this first section has been singlehandedly written by me, undergoing only a legal proofreading to ensure non-lawyer me doesn't create any unwanted issues. No employee has authorization to alter this section in any way, _. Whilst this document is publicly available for anybody to read, if you're reading it there's a high chance today is your first day of work at Rimelight Entertainment - congratulations on the position! Therefore, I'm now personally delivering your first two assignments: 1. Read this handbook in its entirety at least once. 2. Engage with our products - play games, watch videos, read comics, you choose! That's it! Your first day here is entirely dedicated to these two activities.

Throughout this document and the rest of our website, direct commentary from me is contained within Callouts like this one.

The name "Rimelight" is composed of a portmanteau between “rime” and “light”, concepts present in our intellectual properties. They represent the existential struggle between nihilist and existentialist philosophy, and how we live the story of our lives.

Privacy Using any of our products involves trusting us with your
time, money, and information, therefore these should be handled
with care and respect. - Regular third-party audits and rigid
incentives towards regulatory compliance. - Clear descriptions
provided on what data we collect and how it gets used, as well as
where it might end up. - Tools for autonomous and parental control
as well as guidance material to promote healthy and secure usage
of our products.first-party is best party *What about money? Isn't
this a large capitalist corporation?* Yes, it is - and it
definitely requires money to keep running. However, generating
revenue has never been a focus and never will be. It is an
important part of the system and certainly a key point involved in
decision making, but _. We are more than confident in the ability
of our products generating enough revenue to sustain themselves
without exploitative efforts toward that. , and keeping our
company independent is a very important _ for that. Rimelight
Entertainment is completely owned by me and has very loose
financial ties to our publisher _. What truly matters in here is
what matters to me, and buying yachts and private jets is not in
my bucket list.
